title: cannot create recordings in league client send help
body: for about the past week every time i try to record in the spectator client; as soon as i press the record button it immediately bug splats me. this has happened up to at least 2 dozen times, at first i thought it was a fault with the storage on my pc but i think theres a bit more to it than that. i get league is just a game but my replays are so precious to me, since it was introduced to the client i've archived up to 1200 replays and very eagerly wish to continue before the games ive played recently are reach the replay expiry. so please riot staff, give me a hand here

replies.body: Please try the steps in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Support article. If that doesn't work, let us know, and we can troubleshoot with you further.

That's probably a question better aimed at Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Hopefully they can at least point you in the right direction, but it's probably best if you give them some more detailed information like PC specs, harddrive space, how you are recording them, and so on.
